EMailInformation.Subject: Welcome to @BRAND_NAME@!
EMailInformation.Message:
Hi @FIRST_NAME@,

Your @BRAND_NAME@ account has been activated and is ready for use. Below are the login credentials for your account:

User ID : @USER_NAME_OR_USER_CODE@
Password : @PASSWORD@

The password you have been assigned is temporary, and you will be asked to change it during your first login. You may also change your User ID one time.

Setup:

Your account was set up to process credit card transactions on most Apple and Android Mobile devices. Please follow the simple steps below to set up your device within minutes:

1. Download the @BRAND_NAME@ application from the Apple App Store if you are using an iPhone/iPad/iPod device, or from Google Play if you are using an Android device.

2. Log into the @BRAND_NAME@ App with the credentials above and reset your password.

You are now ready to accept credit cards on your mobile device with @BRAND_NAME@.

Swiping Cards:

After logging in, please go to the Settings menu, select Card Readers and choose your card swipe device. If you are using a Bluetooth Printer/Reader, please make sure the printer is first paired with your mobile device before starting the mobile payment app.

Web Portal for your @BRAND_NAME@ Account:

You can manage your @BRAND_NAME@ account on the web at @COMPANY_URL@. The login credentials for the web portal are the same as the credentials for the mobile device.

If you have any questions regarding your @BRAND_NAME@ account, or if you need any additional assistance, please contact our Customer Care Team at @COMPANY_SUPPORT_EMAIL@ or @COMPANY_SUPPORT_PHONE@.

Sincerely,

@BRAND_NAME@
